facts: The Beatles are one of the best-selling music groups in history, with songs that helped change pop and rock music worldwide.
Beyonce began her career in the group Destiny's Child before becoming a major solo artist known for powerful vocals and performances.
Michael Jackson was called the "King of Pop" and his album "Thriller" is often listed as one of the best-selling albums ever.
Taylor Swift has released albums in several styles, including country and pop, showing how artists can evolve over time.
Queen's song "Bohemian Rhapsody" became famous for mixing different musical sections into one long track with big harmonies.
Bob Marley helped bring reggae music to global audiences and many of his songs focus on peace, freedom, and unity.
BTS is a South Korean group that helped make K-pop popular around the world through music, videos, and dedicated fans.
